extendedInfo.description: Download the Ayurvedic herbs and Medicines free to know all herbs and medicines. This Application provides list of Ayurvedic Plants along with its details and image (picture) of each herb / herbal plant. Medicinal plants are plants which have a recognized medical use. They range from plants which are used in the production of mainstream pharmaceutical products to plants used in herbal medicine preparations. Ayurveda is used today as a generic term for traditional Indian medicine.Ayurveda is a complete medical system. It deals with health in all its aspects; physical health, mental balance, spiritual well-being, social welfare, environmental considerations, dietary and lifestyle habits, daily living trends, and seasonal variations in lifestyle, as well as treating and managing specific diseases.Ayurvedic, medicine, herbal is an overview of the wonders of ayurvedic pharmacology: how Ayurveda understands plants, how it prepares them and how these preparations are used. Ayurveda is literally translated as science of life but it can also be described as the way of living with awareness and promoting longevity.

reviews.title: GOOD
reviews.comment: Add more pictures. Add other indian language names.
reviews.author: rajendran alagappan

reviews.title: Very poor design
reviews.comment: Well, this has to be the worst app I have tried. I have a few hundred installed.  The interface is almost unusable (I have a nexus 4). It has no menu system. You have to scroll through oversized thumbnails with the herb name under them. It does something very odd when I try to select a herb and ends up selecting a completely different one. There is no search option.  Even if it were possible to view the herb I want to select, the info does not include any ayurvedic data. Nothing on the doshas for instance.
reviews.author: Jonathan Evatt

reviews.title: Installs Airplay ads!
reviews.comment: This app installs airplay adds.  It lacks many important uncommon herbs.  It gets a poor rating because of adds
reviews.author: Kelly Russell
